products.title: TEEN TEEN Ceremonial Makeup 8 Color Eyeshadow Kit - 03 Vibrant Pops
products.shortDisc: The TEEN. TEEN 8 Color Metallic eyeshadow packs a captivating collection of 8 rich, irresistible shadows in luxurious and innovative...
products.fullDisc:
The TEEN. TEEN 8 Color Metallic eyeshadow packs a captivating collection of 8 rich, irresistible shadows in luxurious and innovative textures. Sourced from TAIWAN, it is an ultimate weapon for creating alluring eye looks and sumptuously smokey eyes, to unleash your fiercest, naughty alter-ego. Whether you're slaying the day or night, cast the rule book aside and take your lids from nice to naughty with the swipe of a brush. Cruelty-free, talc-free, gluten-free.

Price: Rs 599/-

Weight: 150 g (Full Size)

How to use: For sumptuously smokey eyes:
Build your base with the matte cream marble and matte powder shadows.
Pick up metallics and cream shimmer marbles with a brush in small circular motions, then apply on lids for an illuminating finish. Build an extra layer using your fingers or a sponge brush for a high-shine foil effect.
For a soft, pearlescent glow, apply the pearl gloss hybrid to bare lids using your finger or a flat brush.

products.title: Disguise Velvet Glow Multistick - 64 Rose Gold Stormborn
products.shortDisc: A deep rose gold with hints of copper and gold, this shade is super flattering for all skin tones. As...
products.fullDisc:
A deep rose gold with hints of copper and gold, this shade is super flattering for all skin tones. As a very versatile shade, this works well any way you want to use it - a highlighter, eyeshadow or eyeliner!

Metallic bliss and in the most convenient, easy to use format. You want it, you got it! Trendy and eye-catching, spice up every look with these versatile shimmer shades. Use them at full pigment intensity in a single stroke or effortlessly blend them out for a dewy look. These multi-use crayons are all set to be your new best friend.

BENEFITS

Super smooth to apply for an easily wearable finish.

Richly pigmented yet blendable.

Extremely comfortable & feels light on your skin.

100% Waterproof Designed for makeup experts and beginners alike.

HOW TO USE

As an eyeshadow: Use the crayon at an angle with full intensity pigment application.

As a highlighter: Use the crayon at an angle while lightly applying the product. Blend out for an even look that catches the light at the right angle.

As an eyeliner: Use the crayon tip for precise, fine line application on the eyelid close to the lashes.

As a lip topper: Use the crayon at an angle over any smudge-proof/transfer-proof lipstick for a metallic lip look.

Full Size - 3.2 Grams
Worth - INR 600

Flattering with any look, they add just the right amount of sparkle for day or night. Wear them on their own or as a base to intensify any eyeshadow!

products.title: SUGAR Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner - 05 Green Eyes (Dark Green/ Deep Green)
products.shortDisc: Make way, ladies...
products.fullDisc:
Make way, ladies - the saviour for all your winged eye woes, is here! With its silky smooth formula and a rich matte finish, the Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner, is the queen of ultra-luxe. Achieve absolute symmetry in everything from the chic-yet-casual look to the sultry cat-eye with this beauty and that’s not all. Smudge-proof and water-resistant, your eyes will now sport the boldest of tug-free flicks for 12 straight hours. Grab one today for those effortless ‘Oh! So dramatic’ looks that will stay with you through thick and thin.

Comes with a built-in extendable brush that helps you ace those perfect luscious strokes on the go. Available in 5 shades, this eyeliner is the Gel of the New Generation.

  • Cheat your way into a state of trance with 04 PURPLE HAZE - intense grape purple hue to bedazzle your eyes.

How to Apply: Dip the built-in brush into the gel eyeliner pot. Dab it gently on the edge to remove excess. Trace a line from the inner corner, extend it towards the outer corner of the eye and rock that super-rad wing!

Benefits: With rich, creamy pigment and a bulletproof wear SUGAR Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner glides across skin smoothly to create superb, smudge-proof strokes with saturated colour. Its excellent waterproof formula has legit staying powers.

Additional Details: The richly pigmented Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested and approved. It is available in 5 fabulous shades, 01 Blackmagic Woman, 02 Roadhouse Blues, 03 Brown Sugar, 04 Purple Haze and 05 Green Eyes.

Net Weight: 2.3 gm

List of ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Paraffin, Isododecane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Talc, Sorbitan Stearate, Microcrystalline Wax, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Phenoxyethanol, Tin Oxide. May contain: CI 77891, CI 15850, CI 77499, CI 77510, CI 42090.

products.title: Uptown Curl Lengthening Mascara - 01 Black Beauty (Black)
products.shortDisc: Get ready to stir...
products.fullDisc:
Get ready to stir up a storm with a wink!

Here is the SUGAR Uptown Curl Lengthening Mascara - fulfilling all your lash fantasies. Caution: You are about to be the center of attraction with this volumizing, lengthening & curling mascara that comes with a hi-tech curved brush & an extreme black formula. This magic wand easily pulls through each lash smoothly and lays down a generous amount of product in one swipe - giving your lashes a gravity defying lift, an instant curl and a dramatic voluminous look that’s smudge-proof and clump-free, lasting for 8+ hours.

How to Apply: Prepare for the lash lift! Hold your mascara and position the wand in such a way that the claw brush spoons the curve of your lashes. Starting from the root, sweep the wand upward, guiding the shape of your lashes. For extra definition and fullness, wiggle the brush from side to side. Apply multiple coats for volume. Now move to your lower lashes: smoothen the lashes with the hollow side of the brush, from the center to the outer corner and return towards the inner corner of the eyelid. The result: incredible control for insane lashes!

Benefits: Create fluttery fullness with this ergonomically curved brush with fine bristles that coats the product on to each lash giving special attention to the inner lashes, finally saving you from the struggle to maneuver it in all different angles. The ultra-creamy, fibrous texture comes in a formula that’s not too dry, not too wet, lightweight and intensely black. This unique formula also boosts the growth of your natural lashes, fuels thickness and strength on regular use.

Additional Details: The SUGAR Uptown Curl Lengthening Mascara is paraben-free. Easy removal with warm water or makeup remover. One swipe of either loosens the film and allows the formula to slide off easily.

Available in the shade "01 Black Beauty (Black)".

Made in Taiwan.
Net Weight: 5g

List of Ingredients: Water, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Candelilla Cera, Polyester-5, Palmitic Acid, Paraffin, Oryza Sativa (Rice Bran) Wax, Stearic Acid, Triethanolamine, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Nylon-6, Glycol Montanate, 1,3-Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Sudium Dehydrocetate, Caprylyl Glycol and Hydrated Silica. May contain CI 77266 (D&C Black 2).

products.title: SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Quad
products.shortDisc: Unleash your inner artist...
products.fullDisc:
Unleash your inner artist and create a makeup masterpiece every day with the SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Quads. With a range of 17 high-performing mattes and extra-creamy metallics, these super-pigmented shades are infinitely smooth and incredibly easy to blend. Snap up these jaw-dropping hues in 18 captivating quads that come with a dual-ended sponge applicator. But wait, did we bring up its uber-chic packaging yet? This gorgeous tray of colours is built to dethrone the current pride of your vanity display. Talk about eye candy!

  • Craft the perfect daytime natural look with Stronger that lives up to its name with a mixture of medium brown, champagne gold, metallic chocolate and bronze gold.

  • You cannot go wrong when you Believe – thanks to its cocktail of beige mauve, deep plum, metallic chocolate and metallic rose gold, getting a subtle smoked look is now a breeze.

  • Escapade is a set of four completely matte shades – beige mauve, deep plum, blackened purple and light coral – that is perfect to create a warm, smoked look.

  • With champagne gold, bronze gold, metallic rose gold and copper, Chandelier will light up your trousseau and is unbeatable for the subtle metallic look that's just perfect for those nights out.

  • If you're a fan of the earthy glam look, Irreplaceable with its champagne gold, bronze gold, medium brown and copper shades will give you all the feels.

  • With its shades of grey, bright blue, metallic purple and blackened purple, it's easy to build up a dramatic blue smokey look using Disturbia.

  • Nail it at work with Applause - its roster of beige mauve, deep plum, metallic rose gold and medium brown works hard to help you achieve that classic neutral look.

  • Go from day to night with Respect that features the shades cream, light coral, copper and bright coral to effortlessly blend into a burnt orange look.

  • Get Diamonds for its punchy shades of bright blue, metallic smokey teal and metallic purple that's balanced by grey to make your eyes pop with an inimitable midnight blue look.

  • Dip your tips in Waterfalls and make the most of its grey, bright blue, metallic smokey teal and blackened purple hues for a bold midnight look.

  • Promiscuous promises a showstopping smoked plum look with its heady mix of subtle mauve, deep plum, blackened purple and grey.

  • Yes, it’s Complicated! An eye-popping selection of light coral, copper, blackened purple and metallic purple to take you from dusk to dawn in a sunset smokey look.

  • Pose for Paparazzi with a head-turning heavy metal look that’s made of champagne gold, bright gold, metallic smokey teal and stunning copper.

  • Skyfall is the fix for the makeup junkie in you who takes a bit of everything - from cream and subtle mauve to metallic purple and bright blue - to handcraft a stunning blue peacock look.

  • A dream collection of cream, subtle mauve, metallic smokey teal and light coral, Bootylicious is for any goddess looking for a fresh take on the subtle smokey look.

  • Roar out loud to achieve a subtle bling look that is suitable for any occasion from daily daytime fresh to prime time evening glamour.

  • Goldeneye is a pretty combination of cream, subtle mauve, metallic chocolate and bright gold shades for a soft, romantic look.

  • If you’re looking to flaunt a neutral pop look, it’s time to get Scandalous with this killer assortment of cream, subtle mauve, metallic purple and bright gold.

How To Apply

  • Start by taking a colour that is a shade or two darker than your skin tone and run it back and forth onto your crease as a transition shade
  • Start blending at the point where you want the deepest colour, like the outer corner and aim toward the place where you want the lightest colour. By doing this, a gradient will be created by the colour choice alone
  • Next go for the shimmer shade on the lid to get that pop. Use the doe-tip sponge applicator or a damp flat brush or your finger for that additional depth
  • Use a darker shade on the crease to define the eye shape. Start applying from the outer corner of the eye, making a ‘V’, and blend it halfway through the eyelid with the round eyeshadow blending brush

Easy Shade Guide:

  • The lightest colourusually works well as a brow bone highlighter.
  • The second lightest colourusually looks good on the lid and creates a base to apply the shade of your choice, matte or shimmer
  • The second darkest colour usually works best on the crease
  • The darkest colour usually works best in the outer corner

Benefits: Each of the 17 shades in the SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Quad range is richly pigmented, blendable without loss of pay-off and lasts for hours without creasing or smudging. This product is dermatologically tested & approved and 100% safe for your skin.

Additional Details: The SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Quads come in 18 captivating quad options viz. Stronger, Believe, Escapade, Chandelier, Irreplaceable, Disturbia, Applause, Respect, Diamonds, Waterfalls, Promiscuous, Complicated, Paparazzi, Skyfall, Bootylicious, Roar, Goldeneye and Scandalous. Also available in two versatile palette options - Vogue and Firework. This product is free from parabens, D5, oil, mineral oil and nano-ingredients.
Net Weight: 5 gm.

List Of Ingredients: Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Talc, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Magnesium Myristate, Tin Oxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Dimethicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Diisostearyl Malate, Hexyl Laurate, Zinc Stearate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Carmine, Ferric, Ferrocyanide, Bismuth Oxychloride, Ultramarines, Red 7 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake.

Unleash your inner artist and create a makeup masterpiece every day with the SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Quads. With a range of 17 high-performing mattes and extra-creamy metallics, these super-pigmented shades are infinitely smooth and incredibly easy to blend. Snap up these jaw-dropping hues in 18 captivating quads that come with a dual-ended sponge applicator. But wait, did we bring up its uber-chic packaging yet? This gorgeous tray of colours is built to dethrone the current pride of your vanity display. Talk about eye candy!

Pose for Paparazzi with a head-turning heavy metal look that’s made of champagne gold, bright gold, metallic smokey teal and stunning copper.

How To Apply

  • Start by taking a colour that is a shade or two darker than your skin tone and run it back and forth onto your crease as a transition shade
  • Start blending at the point where you want the deepest colour, like the outer corner and aim toward the place where you want the lightest colour. By doing this, a gradient will be created by the colour choice alone
  • Next go for the shimmer shade on the lid to get that pop. Use the doe-tip sponge applicator or a damp flat brush or your finger for that additional depth
  • Use a darker shade on the crease to define the eye shape. Start applying from the outer corner of the eye, making a ‘V’, and blend it halfway through the eyelid with the round eyeshadow blending brush

Easy Shade Guide:

  • The lightest colour usually works well as a brow bone highlighter.
  • The second lightest colour usually looks good on the lid and creates a base to apply the shade of your choice, matte or shimmer
  • The second darkest colour usually works best on the crease
  • The darkest colour usually works best in the outer corner

Benefits: Each of the 17 shades in the SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Quad range is richly pigmented, blendable without loss of pay-off and lasts for hours without creasing or smudging. This product is dermatologically tested & approved and 100% safe for your skin.

Additional Details: The SUGAR Blend The Rules Eyeshadow Quads come in 18 captivating quad options viz. Stronger, Believe, Escapade, Chandelier, Irreplaceable, Disturbia, Applause, Respect, Diamonds, Waterfalls, Promiscuous, Complicated, Paparazzi, Skyfall, Bootylicious, Roar, Goldeneye and Scandalous. Also available in two versatile palette options - Vogue and Firework. This product is free from parabens, D5, oil, mineral oil and nano-ingredients.
Made in Italy
Net Weight: 5 gm.

List Of Ingredients: Mica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Talc, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Magnesium Myristate, Tin Oxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Dimethicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Diisostearyl Malate, Hexyl Laurate, Zinc Stearate. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxides, Carmine, Ferric, Ferrocyanide, Bismuth Oxychloride, Ultramarines, Red 7 Lake, Yellow 5 Lake.

products.title: Stroke Of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl - 02 Purple Rain
products.shortDisc: For all you strong sassy women who don’t wait for the storm to pass, but dance in the Purple Rain.
products.fullDisc:
For all you strong sassy women who don’t wait for the storm to pass, but dance in the Purple Rain. Captivate the world with your guts when you swipe this purple seductress.

Eye makeup can be tricky but a stroke of genius can put you at ease. Add to that colour and soft creamy texture and you know you've been hooked for life. We're on about SUGAR Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl - a waterproof Kohl pencil that can add pretty to your eyes in a single swipe. Its wax-based formula spreads evenly and lasts for up to 8 hours. Not just that, it comes with a free sharpener to ensure your eye makeup is always on point.

Bonus: Every SUGAR Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl comes with its specially designed high quality sharpener that is carefully crafted to help you make the most of your purchase. For more details about the Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl Sharpener.

How to apply: Gently rim your lower and upper lash lines with this creamy Kohl. Open your eyes wide for precise application.

Benefits: This high-performance waterproof Kohl provides maximum colour in a single stroke and lasts for up to 8 hours. Its creamy texture makes application super easy and helps to create varied eye makeup looks in a matter of minutes.

Additional details: The SUGAR Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl is currently available in the 5 shade 01 Back to Black, 02 Purple Rain, 03 Green Light, 04 Blue Suede Shoes, 05 Black Magic. It is free of mineral oil, paraffin, preservatives, volatile cyclomethicones (D4, D5, D6) and animal derived ingredients.
Made in Germany.
Size: 1.2 gm.

List of Ingredients: Iron Oxides, Black 2, Mica, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Silica, Stearyl Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate/Dimethiconol Crosspolymer, Octadecene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isoceteth-10.

products.title: Stroke Of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl - 03 Green Light
products.shortDisc: For all you spirited women with LIT attitude, whose hearts revel in the Green Light. Allure the cosmos with your...
products.fullDisc:
For all you spirited women with LIT attitude, whose hearts revel in the Green Light. Allure the cosmos with your passion when you sport this green goddess.

products.title: SUGAR Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner - 02 Roadhouse Blues
products.shortDisc: Make way, ladies -...
products.fullDisc:
Make way, ladies - the saviour for all your winged eye woes, is here! With its silky smooth formula and a rich matte finish, the Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner, is the queen of ultra-luxe. Achieve absolute symmetry in everything from the chic-yet-casual look to the sultry cat-eye with this beauty and that’s not all. Smudge-proof and water-resistant, your eyes will now sport the boldest of tug-free flicks for 12 straight hours. Grab one today for those effortless ‘Oh! So dramatic’ looks that will stay with you through thick and thin.

Comes with a built-in extendable brush that helps you ace those perfect luscious strokes on the go. Available in 2 signature shades, this eyeliner is the Gel of the New Generation.

  • Slay that badass Old West vibe with the 02 ROADHOUSE BLUES. If you are done with the mundane and adventure is what stirs your soul, put some Roadhouse Blues on and glide to glory!

How to Apply: Dip the built-in brush into the gel eyeliner pot. Dab it gently on the edge to remove excess. Trace a line from the inner corner, extend it towards the outer corner of the eye and rock that super-rad wing!

Benefits: With rich, creamy pigment and a bulletproof wear SUGAR Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner glides across skin smoothly to create superb, smudge-proof strokes with saturated colour. Its excellent waterproof formula has legit staying powers.

Additional Details: The richly pigmented Born To Wing Gel Eyeliner is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested and approved. It is available in 2 fabulous shades, Blackmagic Woman and 02 Roadhouse Blues.

Made in Taiwan

Net Weight: 2.3 gm

List of ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Paraffin, Isododecane, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Mica, Sorbitan Stearate, Microcrystalline Wax, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Phenoxyethanol, Tin Oxide. May Contain: C.I Nos. 77499, 77266, 77891, 42090, 15850.

products.title: SERY Flashlite Blusher Stick - B3 Coral Cat
products.shortDisc: Set the ramp on fire with SERY natural flush of color on your cheeks within seconds. Add more charm to...
products.fullDisc:
Set the ramp on fire with SERY natural flush of color on your cheeks within seconds. Add more charm to your cheeks with extra care, all day long. So blush, blossom and get ready for the flash!
This multi-tasking creamy formula blends effortlessly to create a natural pop of color on your cheeks. The precious ultra-fine pigments and special soft focus powder present in it leaves a seductively natural, long lasting and silky-touch. Infused with the goodness of Red Raspberry, the formula moisturizes the skin and gives on-the-go radiance.
Perfect for instant pop touch-ups!

The formulation is free from:

  • Parabens
  • Preservatives
  • Mineral Oil
  • D5

Price: Rs 649/-

Weight: 7.5 Grams (Full Size)

How to use:

  • Natural Flush: Apply directly onto the cheekbones and lightly blend with your fingertips for a natural flush.
  • Bold Pop: Apply multiple strokes of color for a bold pop. Concentrate on the apple of the cheeks and blend it outwards, in the direction of the ear.

products.title: SERY Flashlite Highlighter Stick - H1 Gleam Girl
products.shortDisc: Be the prism of the party and shine in the crowd with this gleaming beauty! This buildable, velvety formula imparts...
products.fullDisc:
Be the prism of the party and shine in the crowd with this gleaming beauty! This buildable, velvety formula imparts a natural-looking finish. It adds an iridescent glow on cheekbones, brow bones, the nasal bridge, or anywhere you want to add a touch of luminosity.
This sheer, multi-tasking formula blends effortlessly to create shimmering accents and highlights on all skin tones. The precious ultra-fine pearls and soft focus powder leaves a seductively natural, long lasting and silky touch. Infused with the goodness of Red Raspberry, the formula moisturizes the skin and gives on-the-go radiance.
Layer it on for a dazzling highlight.

The formulation is free from:

  • Parabens
  • Preservatives
  • Mineral Oil
  • D5

Price: Rs 649/-

Weight: 7.5 Grams (Full Size)

How to use: Sweep it across the eyes, cheekbones, brow bones, cupid’s bow, shoulders or any part of body for instant illumination.

products.title: Disguise Velvet Glow Multistick - 64 Rose Gold Stormborn
products.shortDisc: A deep rose gold with hints of copper and gold, this shade is super flattering for all skin tones. As...
products.fullDisc:
A deep rose gold with hints of copper and gold, this shade is super flattering for all skin tones. As a very versatile shade, this works well any way you want to use it - a highlighter, eyeshadow or eyeliner!

Metallic bliss and in the most convenient, easy to use format. You want it, you got it! Trendy and eye-catching, spice up every look with these versatile shimmer shades. Use them at full pigment intensity in a single stroke or effortlessly blend them out for a dewy look. These multi-use crayons are all set to be your new best friend.

BENEFITS

Super smooth to apply for an easily wearable finish.

Richly pigmented yet blendable.

Extremely comfortable & feels light on your skin.

100% Waterproof Designed for makeup experts and beginners alike.

HOW TO USE

As an eyeshadow: Use the crayon at an angle with full intensity pigment application.

As a highlighter: Use the crayon at an angle while lightly applying the product. Blend out for an even look that catches the light at the right angle.

As an eyeliner: Use the crayon tip for precise, fine line application on the eyelid close to the lashes.

As a lip topper: Use the crayon at an angle over any smudge-proof/transfer-proof lipstick for a metallic lip look.

Full Size - 3.2 Grams
Worth - INR 600

products.title: Disguise Velvet Glow Multistick - 63 Champagne Moonshine
products.shortDisc: This perfect mix of rose gold with hints of gold and silver shade is super flattering for all skin tones....
products.fullDisc:
This perfect mix of rose gold with hints of gold and silver shade is super flattering for all skin tones. Works best to highlight and accentuate the inner eye.
